titles.title: GAIN AI Act of 2025
GAIN AI Act of 2025
Guaranteeing Access and Innovation for National Artificial Intelligence Act of 2025
A bill to require entities seeking a license to export advanced artificial intelligence chips to countries of concern to certify that United States persons have priority in acquiring those chips.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
